content: I wonder if it is just that there isn't as much that can be done outside of a certain window. I know a lot of ppl who are looking for local opportunities but aren't getting responses back from local offices. I will dig into who might be/ if there are voter registration pushes or other opportunities for people who are looking for more in-person community building events.

LMK if you find anything and I will do the same. I know the SD NOW chapter met at the Mission Valley library last week but I wasn't able to make it. I will check their website to see if they have any new info.
Sounds great! I signed up as a volunteer for the SD DNC but haven't heard anything. I figured it would be bigger in a few weeks
